original_title: Ernie Ball Presents: Real to Reel With Slash, Featuring Myles Kennedy & the Conspirators
overview: Slash and his band Myles Kennedy and the Conspirators offer a behind-the-scenes look at the in-studio recording process as they work on his third solo album.
title: Ernie Ball Presents: Real to Reel With Slash, Featuring Myles Kennedy & the Conspirators
